programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Baseball Tonight: Sunday Night Countdown
programme.desc: Leading into each of ESPN's Sunday Night Baseball telecasts is this special edition of "Baseball Tonight." Host Karl Ravech teams with analysts and reporters to present fans a detailed preview of the network's exclusive, national game of the week. Highlights of the day's other games, interviews with players and managers, and key storylines from around the league also fill the hourlong show. Mark Teixeira, Eduardo Pérez, Tim Kurkjian and Buster Olney are among the analysts.

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.desc: From A. Bartlett Giamatti Little League Center in Bristol, Conn.

programme.desc: From Warner Robins American Little League in Warner Robins, Ga.

programme.desc: From A. Bartlett Giamatti Little League Center in Bristol, Conn.

programme.desc: From A. Bartlett Giamatti Little League Center in Bristol, Conn.

programme.title: Cornhole
programme.desc: USA Cornhole's best military and first resonder players battle it out for the USA Forces National Doubles Championship.

programme.title: Pro Breaking Tour: Taboo Feature Show
programme.desc: Pro breaking action.

programme.title: The 2024 Silverback Breaking Invitational
programme.desc: The Silverback Breaking Invitational is a prestigious prize money competition showcasing the new Olympic sport of breaking.

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Average Joe's Gym and its owner, Peter La Fleur (Vince Vaughn), are both down on their luck. A fancy competing gym called Globo-Gym, run by the maniacal health nut White Goodman (Ben Stiller), is about to put Average Joe's out of business unless Peter can raise $50,000 to keep his mortgage. To save the gym, Peter and a ragtag group of Average Joe's members and employees enter a dodgeball contest with a big cash prize. In response, White forms his own Globo-Gym team to rout the competition.

programme.title: 2024 Corgi Races at Emerald Downs
programme.desc: Corgis from throughout the Pacific Northwest will be at Emerald Downs Racetrack in Auburn, Washington for the annual Corgi Races.

programme.title: 2024 World Dog Surfing Championships Best Waves
programme.desc: The World Dog Surfing Championships Best Waves competition awards the best waves champion dog surfers have surfed over the past year.

programme.title: OneWheel 2022 World Championship
programme.desc: The best OneWheel racers in the world compete on singular-wheeled electric boards at a custom built course to determine a OneWheel Race for the Rail World Champion at Sky Tavern Ski Lodge in Reno, Nev.

programme.title: 2022 Noblesville Bed Races
programme.desc: Teams navigate wheeled beds through the streets of Noblesville, Ind.

programme.title: 2021 US Air Guitar Championships
programme.desc: The National Finals of the 2021 US Air Guitar Championships. Top performers from across the country battle it out for the national title belt, as they compete to become the greatest air guitarist in all the land.

programme.title: USA Dodgeball All-Star Showcase
programme.desc: The USA Dodgeball All-Star Showcase pits seasoned All-Star players from across the country against each other in a no-holds-barred competition for fame, glory, and bragging rights.

programme.title: eSkootr Championship Racing
programme.desc: Coverage of the eSkootr Championship, the world's first electric scooter racing series.

programme.title: ZoneBall Clash
programme.desc: In an electrifying showdown, the forces of Team JETPACK and Team DRAGON collide in the heart-pounding arena of the exciting new sport of Zoneball.

programme.title: 2022 Speed Chess Championship Final
programme.desc: The Speed Chess Championship Final represents the pinnacle of online speed chess, featuring intense competition, brilliant tactics, and time-pressured decision-making at the highest level of the game.

programme.title: Microsoft Excel World Championship
programme.desc: Spreadsheet wizards compete in an elimination race to advance in the Microsoft Excel Esports event.

programme.title: ProSayulita SUP OPEN
programme.desc: The ProSayulita SUP OPEN brings together the best athletes and young competitors in SUP Surf, Long Distance and Technical races, in Sayulita, Nayarit, Mexico.

programme.title: Battle of the Buoy 2
programme.desc: Pro doubles teams fight to stay afloat in New York City, for a chance to hoist the coveted Golden Buoy. Watch the dramatic conclusion of the largest Buoy Championship to date.

programme.title: 2023 National Putting Tour Final
programme.desc: The 2023 National Putting Tour Final from Putting World in Scottsdale, Arizona, as the nation's best putters battle it out to see who is the best.

programme.title: 2024 Forehand Strike U.S. Open
programme.desc: Some of the best athletes in the world compete in Connecticut in the inaugural Forehand Strike US Open Championship.

programme.title: SXY National Beach Tennis Invitational
programme.desc: The top beach tennis players in the world compete in Hermosa Beach, Calif., for the prestigious National Beach Tennis Invitational Trophy with prize money and bragging rights on the line.

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Average Joe's Gym and its owner, Peter La Fleur (Vince Vaughn), are both down on their luck. A fancy competing gym called Globo-Gym, run by the maniacal health nut White Goodman (Ben Stiller), is about to put Average Joe's out of business unless Peter can raise $50,000 to keep his mortgage. To save the gym, Peter and a ragtag group of Average Joe's members and employees enter a dodgeball contest with a big cash prize. In response, White forms his own Globo-Gym team to rout the competition.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs. Nurmagomedov - Prelims
programme.desc: Guram Kutateladze vs. Jordan Vucenic, lightweight; Shamil Gaziev vs. Don'Tale Mayes, heavyweight; Mohammad Yahya vs. Kaue Fernandes, lightweight; Azamat Murzakanov vs. Alonzo Menifield, light heavyweight. From Etihad Arena in Abu Dhabi.

programme.desc: From Heart Health Park in Sacramento, Calif.

programme.title: CarJitsu Championship
programme.desc: A new craze now booming in Russia, a Jiu Jitsu match held inside a parked car.

programme.title: Ultimate Tire Wrestling
programme.desc: Two big tractor tires. Two skilled wrestlers. One goal: stuff 51% of your opponent into the tire.

programme.title: Major League Paintball
programme.desc: The top two professional paintball teams battle it out in the final match of the 2024 Major League Paintball Atlantic City Open.

programme.title: The 2023 OneWheel World Championship - Race for the Rail
programme.desc: The World Championship Onewheel Racing event featured the best Onewheel riders zooming down Sky Tavern Ski Mountain in a boardercross style event for $10,000. This race took place outside of Reno, Nevada on September 9th, 2023.

programme.title: 2023 FootGolf World Cup
programme.desc: Action from the FootGolf World Cup in Orlando, Fla.

programme.title: 2023 World Table Hockey Championships
programme.desc: The best table hockey players in the world squared off at the iconic Canuck Bar in New York City to see who would become the 2023 World Table Hockey Champion. Tune in with host Arda Ocal to watch some of the most exciting action from the tournament.

programme.title: CROSSNET Sand Series: SoCal
programme.desc: CROSSNET athletes from all over the country flocked to Chula Vista, Calif., to compete in the inaugural CROSSNET Sand Series Socal tournament. Each vying for the title and a grand prize of $5,000.

programme.title: Grass Drag Racing Season Opener
programme.desc: Snowmobilers drag race on grass to determine who's the fastest.

programme.title: Ultimate Disc
programme.desc: Ultimate disc competition.

programme.title: Franklin Rock River Stone Skipping Tournament
programme.desc: Stone skipping. It takes a day to learn, but years to master. The country's greatest skippers battle it out with pitty-pats, plinkers and plonks to claim the title and a traveling trophy. Like the Stanley Cup, but with rocks.

programme.title: 2019 World Sign Spinning Championship
programme.desc: The 12th Annual World Sign Spinning Championship in Las Vegas brings together sign spinners from more than 50 cities and a dozen countries to assess style, execution, and technical sign spinning ability.

programme.title: 2024 Corgi Races at Emerald Downs
programme.desc: Corgis from throughout the Pacific Northwest will be at Emerald Downs Racetrack in Auburn, Washington for the annual Corgi Races.

programme.title: 2024 World Dog Surfing Championships Best Waves
programme.desc: The World Dog Surfing Championships Best Waves competition awards the best waves champion dog surfers have surfed over the past year.

programme.title: Teqball
programme.desc: Major teqball extravaganza descended upon Tulsa, Okla. The one-of-a-kind sporting spectacle was held from June 14 to 16, 2024.

programme.title: Roofball World Championship
programme.desc: The 24th playing of the World Championships competition to determine who's the best at flinging a football at a natural gas vent. Contested at the place of Roofball's invention, Willis Park in Beaverton, Ore.

programme.title: 2024 Hamlin Adult Big Wheel Races
programme.desc: Ten teams compete in a relay style, adult big wheel race, to win the coveted, Hamlin Golden Wheelie Trophy.

programme.title: ESPN Presents Never Tell Me The Odds: Top Sports Seen in Star Wars
programme.desc: In celebration of The Ocho, hosts Arda Ocal, Clinton Yates, and Ryan McGee rank the sports seen throughout the galaxy in Star Wars content.

programme.title: Blade Masters: Axe & Knife Throwing
programme.desc: Two teams of competitors face off in various axe and knife throwing disciplines as these throwers aim for perfection and battle for the title of Blade Master.

programme.title: Slippery Stairs
programme.desc: Five men and women compete at the Orange County Fair against slippery obstacles to race to the top of multiple flights of stairs.

programme.desc: Ultimate disc competition.

programme.title: In the Arena: Serena Williams
programme.desc: After 27 years in professional tennis, Serena Williams shares a personal account of her most meaningful Grand Slam appearances and deconstructs the milestones of her career.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: Three pivotal fights that changed the face of the middleweight division, featuring Rich Franklin vs. Evan Tanner, Anderson Silva vs. Rich Franklin and Chris Weidman vs. Anderson Silva.

programme.title: Unsportsmanlike with Evan, Canty and Michelle
programme.desc: Start the day off right with Chris Canty, Evan Cohen and Michelle Smallmon providing an energizing and informative way to take on the day. Sports, life and laughter are what it's all about.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: ESPN BET Live
programme.desc: ESPN Sports Betting Analysts Erin Dolan and Joe Fortenbaugh, along with host Tyler Fulghum, break down the biggest storylines through the lens of sports betting, with breakdowns, discussions and picks.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: The Herd With Colin Cowherd
programme.desc: "The Herd With Colin Cowherd" is a three-hour sports television show hosted by Colin Cowherd and Jason McIntyre; Cowherd, a veteran broadcaster with over 20 years of experience in the sports television and radio field, is joined by longtime writer and gambling analyst McIntyre. Cowherd and McIntrye regularly provides viewers with authentic, unfiltered opinions on the day's biggest sports topics, joined regularly by special guests including athletes, legends, and analysts.

programme.title: First Things First
programme.desc: "First Things First" is a daily sports talk show hosted by Nick Wright, Chris Broussard and Kevin Wildes. Wright, who started his broadcasting career as a critically acclaimed radio host, is joined by longtime sports reporter and commentator Chris Broussard, and sports television producer, personality, sports radio talk show host, and podcaster Kevin Wildes, as they explore and energetically advance the biggest stories in sports to start the day.

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.desc: Detroit opened a 21-point lead against league-best Boston, but the Celtics rallied to force OT before winning, 128-122. Kristaps Porzingis had eight of his season-high 35 points to lead Boston over the Pistons, who lost their 28th consecutive game.

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.desc: Jordan Clarkson scored 29 of his 36 points after halftime and Lauri Markkanen added 31 as the Utah Jazz outlasted the tough-luck Detroit Pistons 154-148 in overtime.

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.desc: Stephen Curry scored a season-high 60 points, hitting 10-of-23 three-pointers, in the Warriors' 141-134 overtime loss to Trae Young and the Atlanta Hawks. Young led the Hawks with 35 points while Dejounte Murray added 19 points. From Feb. 3, 2024.

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.desc: Austin Reaves had a triple-double and made a tiebreaking 3-pointer with 37.8 seconds left in the second overtime as the Los Angeles Lakers overcame the absence of LeBron James and rallied to beat the Milwaukee Bucks, 128-124. From March 26, 2024.

programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.desc: Jalen Green scored 37 points and Houston won its 10th straight game, defeating the Thunder 132-126 in overtime. Amen Thompson had 25 points and 15 rebounds and Dillon Brooks added 20 points for the Rockets. From March 27, 2024.

programme.title: Béisbol Esta Noche
programme.desc: Si usted es un fanático del béisbol, entonces no querrá perderse esta noche de recapitulación donde se muestran los momentos más destacados de todos los juegos y actualizaciones de los que siguen en curso. Regularmente presentado por Karl Ravech, quien está acompañado por una combinación de analistas, como los ex jugadores John Kruk y Dave Winfield, el ex manager Terry Francona, y los periodistas Tim Kurkjian y Buster Olney.

programme.title: Béisbol MLB
programme.desc: Desde Wrigley Field en Chicago.

programme.title: ESPN Compact
programme.desc: Los mejores resúmenes y momentos destacados de los eventos deportivos más importantes a nivel mundial.

programme.title: Scrum
programme.desc: Un programa que trae lo mejor del rugby mundial con todos los últimos acontecimientos de la URBA, reportajes, entrevistas exclusivas a los protagonistas, los análisis más profundos y los resúmenes de cada partido y evento.

programme.title: Padel Tennis
programme.desc: Acción de la final del torneo. Desde el Superdomo de La Rioja, en Argentina.

programme.title: Fútbol de España
programme.desc: Un vistazo a las mejores atajadas de LaLiga durante la temporada 2023-2024 del fútbol español.

programme.title: Winter News
programme.desc: Un mundo blanco en el living de casa. Recorrido por los centros de esquí de la Cordillera de los Andes, Bariloche y Austria, reconocidos por la calidad de su nieve y por sus impresionantes "fuera de pista".

programme.title: ESPN Fútbol 1
programme.desc: Todo lo que sucedió al término de cada fecha del campeonato de fútbol argentino. Las jugadas más destacadas, los goles, las polémicas y análisis del juego, todo ello aderezado con imágenes y sonidos captados por cámaras exclusivas.

programme.title: ESPN Compact
programme.desc: Lo mejor y los momentos más destacados del torneo abierto de Washington. Desde el William H.G. FitzGerald Tennis Center en Rock Creek Park, en Washington D.C.

programme.desc: Desde Wrigley Field en Chicago.

programme.desc: Acción de la final del torneo. Desde el Superdomo de La Rioja, en Argentina.

programme.desc: Un programa que trae lo mejor del rugby mundial con todos los últimos acontecimientos de la URBA, reportajes, entrevistas exclusivas a los protagonistas, los análisis más profundos y los resúmenes de cada partido y evento.

programme.title: Aguas arriba
programme.desc: La experiencia de la pesca con mosca en Latinoamérica. La búsqueda de truchas en la Patagonia, sea trout y salmones en Chile, dorados en el norte de Argentina y las magníficas especies como bonefish, pertmit y tarpon de Centroamérica y Caribe.

programme.title: Fútbol
programme.desc: Desde el Seoul World Cup Stadium, en Seúl, Corea del Sur.

programme.title: Campeonato Mundial de MotoGP
programme.desc: Cobertura de toda la acción de la carrera del Gran Premio de Gran Bretaña 2024. Desde el circuito Silvertone, en Towcester, Gran Bretaña.

programme.desc: Los momentos más destacados del partido amistoso disputado en el Audi Summer Tour 2024 entre Bayern Munich (Alemania) y Tottenham (Inglaterra). Desde el Estadio Mundialista de Seúl, en Corea del Sur.
